title: Red Bull-Evenepoel Transfer Speculation Heats Up: ‘I Hear and Read the Rumors Every Day’
content:
For now, Primož Roglič remains at the center of the team's Tour de France plans for 2025: 'If there is a top, top rider on the market next year, maybe now we can sign them.'

Read the full article at Red Bull-Evenepoel Transfer Speculation Heats Up: ‘I Hear and Read the Rumors Every Day’ on Velo.
author: ahood
